io.jeo.tile

Class TilePyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.tile.TilePyramid

  • public class TilePyramid
extends Object
    Represents a multi level structure of tiles.

    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  TilePyramid.Origin

      • origin

        public TilePyramid.Origin origin()
        The origin of tile coordinate system.

        This value dictates how tile coordinates (x,y) should be interpreted. The defaule value for this property is TilePyramid.Origin.BOTTOM_LEFT.

      • origin

        public TilePyramid origin(TilePyramid.Origin origin)
        Sets origin of tile coordinate system.

      • tileWidth

        public Integer tileWidth()
        The width in pixels of tiles in the pyramid.

        The default value for this property is 256.

      • tileWidth

        public TilePyramid tileWidth(Integer tileWidth)
        Sets the width in pixels of tiles in the pyramid.

      • tileHeight

        public Integer tileHeight()
        The height in pixels of tiles in the pyramid.

        The default value for this property is 256.

      • tileHeight

        public TilePyramid tileHeight(Integer tileHeight)
        Sets the height in pixels of tiles in the pyramid.

      • grid

        public TileGrid grid(int z)
        Returns the tile grid at the specified zoom level.
        Parameters:
        z - The zoom level
        Returns:
        The tile grid, or null if no such grid exists for the specified zoom.

      • bounds

        public Bounds bounds(Tile t)
        Returns the spatial extent of the specified tile.

        The tile z value must match a zoom level defined by the pyramid. The tile x/y need not fall within the bounds of the pyramid.

        Parameters:
        t - The tile.
        Returns:
        The spatial extent of the tile.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the tile has a z value not defined by the pyramid.

      • realign

        public Tile realign(Tile t,
           TilePyramid.Origin o)
        Realigns a tile with the pyramid.
        Parameters:
        t - The tile to rebase.
        o - The original origin of the tile.
        Returns:
        A newly realigned tile, or null if the t did not map to a grid in the pyramid.

      • cover

        public TileCover cover(Bounds e,
              int width,
              int height)
        Creates a tile cover for the specified bounds using the specified width, height to determine the appropriate tile resolution.

      • cover

        public TileCover cover(Bounds e,
              double resx,
              double resy)
        Creates a tile cover for the specified bounds at the specified resolutions.

      • cover

        public TileCover cover(Bounds e,

        Creates a tile cover for the specified bounds at the specified zoom level.

      • cover

        public TileCover cover(Bounds e,
              TileGrid grid)
        Creates a tile cover for the specified bounds at the tile grid.
